Title: The Badger
Plot: With Blue Mountain State's latest rivalry weekend well underway, Alex and Thad learn that the mascot belonging to Overland, the college they'll be competing against, has gotten loose, prompting them to conduct a search for it.
ParentalRatingReason: Sex scenes, drug use & content that may offend
GuestStars: Frankie Shaw, Page Kennedy, Boomer Esiason, Craig Carton
